name: British Airways A320 Euro Traveller - London Heathrow to Gothenburg
description:
Another fine trip on British Airways! In this video I travel between London Heathrow and Gothenburg Landvetter airports on a British Airways A320. This is a great route to redeem Avios on - at just 4,000 Avios and Â£17.50 off peak, there's plenty of availability. 

We fly on a lovely day across the North Sea and the Kattegat to Sweden. As always, all phases of the flight, the Galleries First Lounge, and food service are covered. Keep an eye out for my geography lessons along the way!

Thanks for watching, and if you haven't already done so, why not subscribe?

You can also follow me on:

Twitter, @pauls_trips

Snapchat: pauls_trips
